price: 42. Ir Mes sukūrėme jiems iš panašių į tuos, ant ko jie joja.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
